mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, image, sort, status, del_flag, add_by, add_dt, edit_by, edit_dt
mapper.update: UPDATE t_category t SET t.del_flag = 1, t.edit_by =#{loginUserId}, t.edit_dt=now() WHERE t.id =#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, t.parent_id, t.image, t.sort, t.status,t.shop_group_id, t.del_flag, t.add_by, t.add_dt, t.edit_by, t.edit_dt FROM t_category t WHERE t.del_flag = 0 AND t.name =#{name} AND t.id =#{id}
